column4: Hey guys. My ubuntu pc has been doing some weird things recently... firefox crashes easily, and it no longer has a record of my bookmarks. xchat suddenly deleted all my colours, and in pidgin, I can see a list of user logs but not the actual logs. any insight?
Used any unsupported repos or added things manually.
no, the only things i've installed in months are fromt he automatic updates
sudo apt-get install pastebinit  && cat /etc/apt/sources.list | pastebinit (Provide Pastebin link in channel)
